explanation: Funds are required to be realigned to the Operation and Maintenance, Space Force, 24/24, appropriation from the Operation and Maintenance, Air Force, 24/24, appropriation for the proper execution of climate resiliency for facilities sustainment, restoration, and modernization projects. The total requirement includes Operation and Maintenance, Space Force for Ascension, Cape Canaveral, and New Boston Projects, but the funding was requested and appropriated in Operation and Maintenance, Air Force. This action does not change the purpose for which the funds were originally appropriated.

explanation: Funds are required to be realigned to the Operation and Maintenance, Space Force, 24/24, appropriation from the Operation and Maintenance, Air Force, 24/24, appropriation, for the proper execution of a portion of a FY 2024 congressional increase for Aqueous Film Foam Removal and Firefighting Vehicles and Facilities. This action does not change the purpose for which the funds were originally appropriated. This is a congressional special interest item.
